name: Grove Guardian
description: A towering ancient treant awakened as a hero. Commands the power of the forest itself, protecting allies and crushing enemies.

abilities.name: Nature's Roar
abilities.description: Unleashes a powerful roar that damages and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Living Armor
abilities.description: Grants bonus armor and health regeneration to a friendly unit or building.

abilities.name: Overgrowth
abilities.description: Ultimate: Roots immobilize and damage all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Nature's Blessing
abilities.description: Passive aura that increases health regeneration for nearby allies.
